text: haey mcheasa robsa anak ban banhchea tha puok anak min trauv korp sakkar krawpi trong laey . haey trauvte thveula tow champoh aupouk mdeay . brasenbae mneak nei keat teangpir ryy keat teangpir mean pheap chasa chrea rsanow cheamuoy anak chaur anak kom niyeay towkean keat teangpir nouv peaky saamdei min samoromy ryy koumhk dak keat teangpir aoy saoh . te anak trauv niyeay towkean keat teangpir nouv peakyasaamdei na del tnphlon bamphot
